SELECT * FROM carousel_item WHERE is_active = true ORDER BY sort_order ASC, id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO carousel_item (title, description, image_url, link_url, sort_order, is_active, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{description}, #{imageUrl}, #{linkUrl}, #{sortOrder}, #{isActive}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE carousel_item SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, link_url = #{linkUrl}, sort_order = #{sortOrder}, is_active = #{isActive}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
